meanings.definition: Not aware of or paying attention to something.
meanings.sent1: She was so unmindful of the time that she missed her bus.
meanings.sent2: The unmindful student didn't notice the teacher calling her name.
meanings.sent3: The unmindful squirrel forgot where it buried its nuts.
meanings.sent4: His unmindful behavior towards safety warnings led to an accident.
meanings.sent5: The unmindful driver ran a red light, causing chaos in the intersection.

meanings.definition: Failing to remember or consider something.
meanings.sent1: I often unmindfully leave my keys at home.
meanings.sent2: She unmindfully skipped an important step in the recipe.
meanings.sent3: He unmindfully overlooked the due date for his assignment.
meanings.sent4: The actor unmindfully forgot his lines during the play.
meanings.sent5: They unmindfully ignored the warning signs and got lost in the forest.

meanings.sent1: The unmindful driver caused a minor accident due to his lack of attention.
meanings.sent2: She felt unmindful of the beauty surrounding her as she rushed through the park.
meanings.sent3: The unmindful puppy kept bumping into furniture while playing.
meanings.sent4: His unmindful actions hurt those around him without him realizing.
meanings.sent5: The unmindful hiker wandered off the trail and got lost in the woods.
